entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this evening then cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
